summary: A compilation of some screenshots made in game. Contains adult content. Please enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
Today I added some screenshots of my new charakter Raylan. You\'ll find a few pictures above.

Edit: I changed his hairstyle (short >>> long), but it\'s still the same character (as you can see).

---------------------------------------------------------------

Update:

I\'ve uploaded two new sets of wallpapers (landscape and indoor compilation and combat compilation). I have taken the pictures priorly my first uploaded file, so there was no ability to configure my settings yet. Nevertheless I hope you like them. You can see some of them in the gallery above.

Edit: It seems to be tricky to take a screenshot during the sequence of a finishing move. But in some cases I pressed the button fast enough and at the precise moment :)

Edit2: Because there is a mass of mods I have used (as you can see on several pictures) it\'s quite difficult to draw up a list.

But I can give credit to a fraction of amazing modders:

e.g.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16381 (Witch armour)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14715 (Baratheon armor)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8566 (Heart of thunder)

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18839 (saruman staff)

and many more...

---------------------------------------------------------------

I decided to share some of the screenshots I\'ve taken in game with those who are interested in using them as desktop background or sth. else. 

Notes:

resolution: 1680 x 1050 pixels

You can see a small selection on top (view gallery)

I used the console commands \'\'tm\'\' and \'\'tfc\'\' to take the screenshots. Maybe this information help you to create and modify your own ones.

Credits:

The following mods are used (I hope I didn\'t forget anyone):

Better males (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488)

Dimonized UNP female body (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709)

Pinup Poser (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17174)

Hair packs of Fallout3 (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17993)

ApachiiSkyhair (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168)

Lovely Hairstyles (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403)

Angels in Skyrim (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11240) 
[Sorry, I didn\'t found the original one]
author: Faraodir
